```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    head_output = df.head()
    describe_output = df.describe()
    return [head_output, describe_output]

result = preview_data(data)
print("Head of the DataFrame:\n", result[0])
print("\nDescription of the DataFrame:\n", result[1])


preview_data(data)
```
